## post() function

Expose a Controller method as a REST API operation mapped to `POST` request method.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function post(path: string, spec?: OperationObject): MethodDecorator;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> | The URL path of this operation, e.g. <code>/product/{id}</code> |
|  spec | <code>OperationObject</code> | The OpenAPI specification describing parameters and responses of this operation. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`MethodDecorator`
